github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: use TypeScript for all code. use camelCase for variable names, PascalCase for class names. Use spaces for indentation. Use single quotes for strings. Use 2 spaces for indentation.

github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Be extremely detailed with the file changes and the reason for the change. Use lots of emojis.
